text: if it doesn't smell like summer don't
buy it okay just promise me that I mean
in the summer why waste your time eating
imperfect fruit right go for the best
today I'm using some of that perfect
fruit to make a delicious fruit salad
it's a cantaloupe black berry salad with
mint and ginger I'm only using 1/2 of a
cantaloupe but you could certainly use
the whole thing scoop out the seeds I
like to slice my melon into wedges and
then cut each piece out and then cut it
into 1-inch pieces but whatever method
works for you it's fine with me if you
use it here's a tip for you guys never
cut fruit that you're gonna eat on a
board where you've been cutting onion it
will taste disgusting have a little
separate board keep it for fruit only
and your fruit salads will always be
delicious - your cantaloupe add 2 cups
of blackberries
if the blackberries aren't perfect go
ahead and use raspberries blueberries
would also be quite delicious here add a
tablespoon of sugar just a little bit to
bring out the sweetness you may really
not even need it it completely depends
on your fruit now I want to add a little
bit of lime zest maybe a half a teaspoon
or so the floral notes that you get from
the lime zest are so great with the
melon some lime juice too a little
acidity is always fantastic to offset
the sweetness and tert salad with melon
I love lime it's about a tablespoon and
then grated ginger I'm gonna peel my
ginger using the edge of a spoon make
sure your spoon is nice and thin on the
edge the thicker edge spoons do not work
as well I just peeled kind of a big
piece I only really need a teaspoon of
grated ginger there we go
stir everything up and you can let this
sit for up to 30 minutes but I can see
the juices are already coming out which
is what you're looking for when you're
letting it sit let me taste and see if
it's good mmm
all it needs is a little bit of fresh
mint basil would also be good thinly
slice your mint if you are letting this
sit for 30 minutes before you serve it
do the mint the last minute the mint
will discolor and lose its flavor really
if you do it too far ahead of time
sprinkle it on serve it up for breakfast
once you give this a try you're gonna be
